sentences.english: Fitzgerald attributes the depravity of the modern dream to wealth and privilege.
sentences.chinese: 菲茨杰拉德把现在美国梦的堕落归过与财富与特权。

sentences.english: Lacking modern lab techniques, Fitzgerald must use deductive reasoning.
sentences.chinese: 没有现代的实验技术，菲茨杰拉德必须运用演绎推理。

sentences.english: Apartment buildings always will be more energy-efficient than a free-standing home, Fitzgerald said.
sentences.chinese: 菲茨杰拉德认为，公寓大楼的能源效益比独栋屋更高。

sentences.english: But the sally advocated by Fitz Gerald was necessary.
sentences.chinese: 然而菲茨杰拉德提出的突围计划仍是必不可少。
